detail_desc: Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and three elastic straps with a fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and three elastic straps with a fastening at the back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow, double-strap sides and string back.
Soft, non-wired mesh bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Mesh Brazilian briefs with a high waist and decorative elastic strap at the top. Lined gusset, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.

Joggers in washed stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, tapered legs with elastication and gathers in the side seams and zips at the hems.

Joggers in washed stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, tapered legs with elastication and gathers in the side seams and zips at the hems.
Slim-fit cargo trousers in cotton twill with a zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with decorative stitching. Flap side pockets and leg pockets, and fake flap pockets at the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with jetted front pockets with decorative studs and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Slightly longer jacket in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist, welt pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in a sturdy weave with narrow lapels, 3/4-length, gathered sleeves and no buttons. Lined.
Long jersey jumpsuit in a loose-fitting style with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long jersey jumpsuit in a loose-fitting style with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shorts in a crêpe weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in a crêpe weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short skirt in a light weave with a sewn-in wrapover, concealed zip in the side and wide flounced hem.
Double-breasted pea coat in sturdy twill with welt side pockets, an inner pocket, a tab with a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-breasted pea coat in sturdy twill with welt side pockets, an inner pocket, a tab with a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Double-breasted, straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with wide peak lapels, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Decorative strap at the back and a single back vent. Lined. The coat is made partly from recycled wool.

Double-breasted, straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with wide peak lapels, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Decorative strap at the back and a single back vent. Lined. The coat is made partly from recycled wool.
Fine-knit V-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend in a straight style with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit V-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend in a straight style with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey crop tops with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced hems and back . Adjustable elastic braces and a zip fly and press-stud. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Christmas jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Christmas jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Christmas jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded bomber jacket in Oxford-weave nylon with a small stand-up collar, and zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front. Zipped sleeve pocket and side pockets, and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
